input_args.claim: "The first source mentions that the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi took place in northern Afghanistan and was part of an intervention by United States-led coalition forces to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which had been harboring al-Qaeda operatives."
